titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Chief Justice Treby at the Assizes held at Horsham in the County of Sussex, on the 23d day of March, 1696[/]7. By Peter Heald, A.M. and prebendary in the Cathedral Church of Chichester.
titleStmt.author: Heald, Peter, d. 1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Elizabeth Janeway bookseller in Chichester; and are to be sold by Eben. Tracy at the Three Bibles on London-bridge,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary half title: "A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Chief Justice Treby.".
Running title reads: A sermon preached at the assizes held at Horsham in Sussex.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
